name: SupportLuteAndKyle
_source: speak;Lute;I'm sorry, were you talking to me?
speak;Kyle;There's nobody else here, is there?
speak;Kyle;I beg your pardon.|I should have introduced myself.|Kyle, of the Knights of Renais.
speak;Lute;Ah, I see.|And I am Lute, mage of profound genius.
speak;Kyle;Very well, Lute.|The pleasure is mine.|To tell you the truth, I've been looking for you.
speak;Lute;Has someone issued a search notice?|Or is there a bounty on my head?|Or is this perhaps a private matter?
speak;Kyle;I...guess it would be that last one.|I have a favor to ask.
speak;Lute;What would it be?|My requests are classified into seven categories and 25 items.
speak;Kyle;I don't know how it would be classified, but...I want you to help us fight.

speak;Kyle;I'm a strong believer that morale is best served by good leadership.|A unit of knights, all trained by Renais's finest generals.|But we're fighting no ordinary foe, and we need more diverse skills.|That's where you come in.|Because you can use magic, you could be invaluable in helping me develop unique battle strategies.
speak;Lute;So that's what you wanted me for, is it?
speak;Kyle;How about it?|Would you do it?

speak;Kyle;I should warn you, I spend my time on the front line.|I ride out to meet the enemy head-|on rather than attacking from afar.|It's a much riskier prospect than supporting from the rear guard.|Is that going to be a problem?

speak;Kyle;Excellent!|I appreciate your help.|I expect we'll be able to generate some stunning tactics together.|You don't need to stay at the front the whole time.|I'll give you a cue when to approach.
speak;Lute;Got it.|I'll do whatever you say.
speak;Lute;You have nothing to worry about.|There's no one better than me!
speak;Kyle;I was right about you.|You've been a great help to us all.
speak;Lute;Well, of course I have!|I told you there's no one better than me!
speak;Kyle;Magic is an incredibly powerful force, isn't it?|Sturdy armor, tough hide, it makes no difference to magic.|I'm in awe of it.
speak;Lute;You're not so bad yourself.|You're an incredible fighter.
speak;Kyle;Yep.|When I was young, there was a lad I hated losing to.|Every day, I trained harder and harder in hopes of defeating him.
speak;Lute;So what happened?|Did you finally beat him?
speak;Kyle;Uh...|Not as such, no.|But I haven't lost to him in a while, either.|We're evenly matched.|I think we force one another to improve.
speak;Lute;I see.|It's always good to have someone against whom you measure yourself.|Aren't you glad you have this personal adversary?
speak;Kyle;Uh-huh.|You know, I think this is the longest conversation we've had.
speak;Kyle;Well, uh...|Not to sound rude, but I didn't take you as the kind to be interested in others.
speak;Lute;No, it's not rude at all.|I just...|got a little interested in you.
speak;Kyle;I see.|Keep up the good work.
speak;Kyle;Hooo...|What a fight!|How are you holding up, Lute?
speak;Lute;No problem, sir.|I could keep this up all day!
speak;Kyle;That's good to hear.|But don't push yourself...|You're vital to my strategy!
speak;Lute;Of course I am!|There's no one better than me!
speak;Kyle;I'd have to agree.|This would be a lot harder without you along.|This might seem forward, but...|What do you do when you're not, well, fighting in wars?
speak;Lute;Me?|Oh, I'm a student of magic.
speak;Kyle;I guessed that much.|What I mean is, do you have any hobbies?
speak;Kyle;That's right.|Take me, for example.|I like to collect carved figurines of animals.|I have a small collection of them back home at Renais.|How about you?
speak;Kyle;Monk-watching?|What are you talking about?|Maybe I should ask a different question.|Do you have any favorite foods?
speak;Lute;Out of everything I've had, curry of dried toad is my favorite.
speak;Lute;I don't cook much, but I'm sure I'd be good at it.|I mean, I can cook with a single word, no fire necessary!
speak;Kyle;Ha ha ha ha ha!|I never get bored talking to you.|I can't explain it, but I find you so refreshing!
speak;Lute;Really?|I like talking to you, too.
speak;Kyle;Why don't you come to Renais once the war is over?
speak;Kyle;Ha!|No objections?T|hat's your answer?|Well, all right, then.|Let's focus on getting through this war first, though.
speak;Kyle;I'm glad to have you with us.
